O

onDataListenerError(int) - Method in interface com.embeddedunveiled.serial.ISerialComDataListener
This methods helps in creating fault-tolerant and recoverable application design in case unexpected situations like serial port removal, bug encountered in OS or driver during operation occurs.
onNewSerialDataAvailable(SerialComDataEvent) - Method in interface com.embeddedunveiled.serial.ISerialComDataListener
The class implementing this interface is expected to override onNewSerialDataAvailable() method.
onNewSerialEvent(SerialComLineEvent) - Method in interface com.embeddedunveiled.serial.ISerialComEventListener
The class implementing this interface is expected to override onNewSerialEvent() method.
onPortMonitorEvent(int) - Method in interface com.embeddedunveiled.serial.ISerialComPortMonitor
Whenever a serial device is plugged or unplugged from system, onPortMonitorEvent() method will be called by native layer.
openComPort(String, boolean, boolean, boolean) - Method in class com.embeddedunveiled.serial.SerialComJNINativeInterface
 
openComPort(String, boolean, boolean, boolean) - Method in class com.embeddedunveiled.serial.SerialComManager
This opens a serial port for communication.
OS_LINUX - Static variable in class com.embeddedunveiled.serial.SerialComManager
 
OS_MAC_OS_X - Static variable in class com.embeddedunveiled.serial.SerialComManager

osName - Static variable in class com.embeddedunveiled.serial.SerialComManager
These properties are used to load OS specific native library.
